replies.msg:
係呀 assume fair dice, 六個outcome 都同一個機會出現 thus p=1/6,
E(X) = summation xi * p(xi)
E(X^2) = summation xi^2 * p(xi)

好簡單咁講
Expected value= mean = 一件事average 的outcome

咁f(x) 就係x呢個數出現的probability
例如f(2)=1/2, x=2 姐係代表x會出2的機會係1/2

咁有左probability 的expected value就係將唔同機率下的x加哂佢

姐係 E(x)= mean= f(X1) x x1 + f(x2) x x2 +... + f(xn) x xn for x= x1,x2,...,xn

UGEB?

唔係完sem 喇咩？
多謝咁多位巴打 我試下再計下先

將一粒銀仔擲3次
會有可能出現公/字嘅combination就係S
然後x就代表出現幾多個head
f(x)就係出現果個數目嘅head嘅可能性

好似當x係0
咁所有combination入面只有{TTT}呢個無出現過head
所以f(0) 就係1/8

咁如此類推出f(1) f(2) f(3)
最後每個x乘番f(x) 再加埋一齊
就係平均擲3次銀仔會出現head嘅機率
明明就中學數學

replies.msg:
Literally u are switching ur concept derived from dependency
From 2d matrix,
X+X is actually 2X

What u talking now is summing up all possible outcome 2numbers in the series from 1 to 6

In this cases
U are literally throwing 2 dice in the same time and seeking for their sum
And u can never say its 2x
U should declare a new series Y = X
The expected value u calculated is E(X+Y) rather than 2X
Game theory?

In the case of X+X the correlation is exactly 1
For the case of X+Y, the correlation is 0
U cannot say its the same...
In the sense of expected value, u should always take care of correlation
